originalText.text: I worked with Marco who assisted me with leasing my apartment here. Iâ€™ve lived in the city for 7 years now and I have never worked with a better, more honest person than Marco. Marco answered all questions of mine and helped make the application process incredibly smooth and quick. He provided clear answers and directions. Marco is clearly dedicated to his profession and exceeds expectations. Anyone who has the chance to work with him will not be disappointed. Thank you, Marco for relieving so much stress of mine with my apartment search and application process!

originalText.text: Lived here for a while when I was working in Brooklyn. Clean corporate studio apartment. The bed could be more comfortable. I couldn't figure out how to work the TV, the remotes did not work, but I did not really need it anyway. There's a gym that will do, but you really have to enjoy this building for being able to run by the water in the morning. I never had to deal with the building management, everything was handled by my firm. Nobody bothered me. Sadly, had to move out due to damage from Hurricane Sandy - that was a day of dragging my stuff down approximately 30 flights of stairs. Wished I had just charged a whole new wardrobe to my corporate card instead, but I was not sure I could get away with it and they were not paying me enough to risk it. Comparable to the corporate housing I lived in in jersey city, but in jersey city it was much bigger, with a better view. Both apts came with a cleaning woman. The corporate apt I moved into after Hurricane Sandy was in Midtown West, more of a touristy area, but modern, sleek, and clean too. One West has a nice lobby entrance. Really nice experience that I couldn't afford without the travel benefits.

originalText.text:
I had a pleasure working with Kleo Qyra from the Bouklisgroup. They were able to accommodate me with my future apartment at Ocean Luxury Residences.
Iâ€™m happy in my new home. Beautiful building, nice gym, sophisticated interiors and super convenient location. Love watching sunsets in Battery Park, grocery shopping in Whole Foods just steps away.
Highly recommend!
